code: class  Solution  {   public :   long  long  wonderfulSubstrings ( string  word )  {   long  ans  =  0 ;   int  prefix  =  0 ;    vector < int >  count ( 1024 );    count [ 0 ]  =  1 ;    for  ( const  char  c  :  word )  {   prefix  ^=  1  <<  c  -  'a' ;     ans  +=  count [ prefix ];     for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  10 ;  ++ i )   ans  +=  count [ prefix  ^  1  <<  i ];   ++ count [ prefix ];   }   return  ans ;   }  };
